WarrantyTerm.name: WarrantyTerm
WarrantyTerm.description: Represents warranty terms defining the labor, parts, and expenses covered, along with any exchange options, provided to rectify issues with products.

Code.description: A code or other identifier associated with this warranty term.

Description.description: The description of the warranty term.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date on which the warranty term became available for use.

ExpensesCoveredDuration.description: The duration for which expenses are covered.

ExpensesCoveredUnitOfTime.description: The unit in which expenses covered duration is measured.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the warranty term is active (true) or not (false).

IsTransferable.description: Indicates whether the warranty can be transferred to a new owner (true) or not (false).

LaborCoveredDuration.description: The duration for which labor is covered.

LaborCoveredUnitOfTime.description: The unit in which labor covered duration is measured.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the warranty term was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the warranty term was last viewed.

PartsCoveredDuration.description: The duration for which parts are covered.

PartsCoveredUnitOfTime.description: The unit in which parts covered duration is measured.

Pricebook2Id.description: The ID of the price book item associated with this warranty term.

UsageCovered.description: The product usage that's covered in the warranty term.

UsageCoveredUomId.description: The unit of measure for the product usage.

WarrantyDuration.description: The duration of the warranty offered by this term.

WarrantyTermName.description: The name of the warranty term.

WarrantyUnitOfTime.description: The unit in which the warranty duration is measured.
